00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "kvi_qstring.h"
00029 #include "kvi_pointerlist.h"
00030 
00031 #include "kvi_kvs_eventhandler.h"
00032 
00033 class KVIRC_API KviKvsEvent
00034 {
00035 protected:
00036         QString                          m_szName;
00037         QString                          m_szParameterDescription;
00038         KviPointerList<KviKvsEventHandler> * m_pHandlers;
00039 public:
00040         // the event name and the parameter description are NOT translated
00041         KviKvsEvent(const char * szEventName,const char * szParameterDescription)
00042                 : m_szName(szEventName), m_szParameterDescription(szParameterDescription), m_pHandlers(0) {};
00043         ~KviKvsEvent();
00044         void clear();
00045         void clearScriptHandlers();
00046         bool hasHandlers(){ return m_pHandlers != 0; };
00047         KviPointerList<KviKvsEventHandler> * handlers(){ return m_pHandlers; };
00048         void addHandler(KviKvsEventHandler * h);
00049         void removeHandler(KviKvsEventHandler * h);
00050         const QString & name(){ return m_szName; };
00051         const QString & parameterDescription(){ return m_szParameterDescription; };
00052 };
